text: Archbishop Anastasi of Tirana, Durrës and All Albania (secular name: Anastasios Yannoulatos (, ); 4 November 1929 - 25 January 2025) was the Archbishop of Tirana, Durrës and All Albania. He was the Head of the Holy Synod of the Autocephalous Orthodox Church of Albania. He was elected in June 1992. Anastasios died on 25 January 2025 at a hospital in Athens, Greece from multiple organ failure caused by gastrointestinal hemorrhage, aged 95. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Greek people Category:Archbishops Category:Makerere University alumni Category:Deaths from gastrointestinal hemorrhage Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure
title: Anastasios of Albania
